overview: From 2025-07-24 to 2025-07-25, elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: optimize knowledge graph
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
## Summary

Optimizes knowledge graph performance and memory usage in the ElizaOS plugin-knowledge system.

## Changes

- Enhanced knowledge retrieval algorithms
- Improved memory management for large knowledge bases  
- Optimized database operations and query processing
- Better error handling and type safety

## Impact

- Faster knowledge retrieval and indexing
- Reduced memory footprint
- Better scalability for large knowledge graphs

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Introduced an optimized interactive knowledge graph for visualizing documents and fragments, with improved performance and usability.
  * Added pagination and dynamic loading of graph nodes for large datasets.
  * Enhanced node details view with improved text wrapping and scroll behavior.
  * Added a legend and clear error/loading states for the knowledge graph.

* **Improvements**
  * Updated layout and styling for better readability and navigation within the knowledge tab.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: Add Ollama as a supported provider for plugin-knowledge and embeddings
topPRs.author: david-dina
topPRs.body:
Added full support and compatibility for Ollama via plugin-ollama. Fully tested on Windows 10. 

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added support for the Ollama AI provider for both text generation and text embedding.
  * Ollama can now be selected as a provider in configuration options.

* **Documentation**
  * Updated setup instructions to include detailed guidance for integrating Ollama, including environment variables, troubleshooting tips, and API key notes.
  * Expanded documentation to reflect Ollama as a valid provider in relevant sections.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topContributors.summary: ChristopherTrimboli: Focused on bugfix work, merging a PR in elizaos/eliza (#5675) that addressed missing gitignores in the plugin starter, and also opened a PR to add a new plugin to the registry. Their code changes primarily involved configuration files.
david-dina: Focused on expanding provider support, opening a PR in elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge (#34) to add Ollama as a supported provider, and provided 3 comments on PRs.
sentdeed: Focused on bugfix work, specifically addressing a spelling error in elizaos/eliza via PR #5674.
0xbbjoker: Focused on optimizing the knowledge graph, opening a new feature PR in elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge (#35) and providing a PR comment.
microgift: Focused on foundational planning for a new smart contract, evidenced by the creation of issue elizaos/auto.fun#521 "autofun smart contract".
lalalune: Focused on identifying and addressing build issues, specifically by creating issue elizaos/eliza#5673 to track errors related to `pino-pretty` in export builds from Bun.
borisudovicic: Focused on planning and initiating new work, evidenced by the creation of issue elizaos/eliza#5676, "Eddy - Devrel Agent Notes."
